#include<iostream>
main(){
	int t,i,j,k,l;
	float h,m,a,temp1,temp2;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		scanf("%f%f",&h,&m);
		if(h>=24 || m>=60)printf("Invalid Time\n");
		else{
		//if(m>30)m=60-m;
		h=h+m/60;
		if(h>=12 && m>=0){h=h-12;}
		
		
		temp1=h*30;//if(temp1>180)temp1=360-temp1;
		temp2=m*6;//if(temp2>180)temp2=360-temp2;
		temp1=temp1-temp2;if(temp1<0)temp1=-temp1;if(temp1>180)temp1=360-temp1;
		
		printf("%0.1f\n",temp1);
	}
	}
	return 0;
}
